title: The Loop Master
subtitle: Advanced For Loops & Range
description:
# Mastering For Loops

## Advanced Range Usage

**Count backwards:**
```gdscript
for i in range(5, 0, -1):
    print(i)  # 5, 4, 3, 2, 1
```

**Skip numbers:**
```gdscript
for i in range(0, 10, 2):
    print(i)  # 0, 2, 4, 6, 8
```

## Looping with Index

```gdscript
var items = ["sword", "shield", "potion"]
for i in range(items.size()):
    print(i, ": ", items[i])
```

## Your Quest

Create various loop patterns for game systems.

solutionCode:
# Loop Challenges

# 1. Countdown from 10 to 1
print("Countdown:")
for i in range(10, 0, -1):
    print(i)
print("BLAST OFF!")

# 2. Print even numbers from 0 to 20
print("\nEven numbers:")
for i in range(0, 21, 2):
    print(i)

# 3. Loop through array with indices
var loot = ["gold", "gem", "potion", "key"]
print("\nLoot found:")
for i in range(loot.size()):
    print("Item ", i + 1, ": ", loot[i])
